channel.title: Blogs on PKT
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on PKT

item.title: Extract Text from Images using Llama OCR
item.description: A step-by-step guide on building an image-to-text extraction tool using Llama 3.2 Vision and Streamlit locally.

item.title: Building Conversational AI Experiences: From Spreadsheets to Multimodal Magic
item.description: A comprehensive guide that will walk you throught the process of making your own Flash chatbot.

item.title: Chat with Excel files using RAG
item.description: An intelligent chatbot that performs RAG on Excel files using cutting-edge AI models.

item.title: Smart Data Analysis with Groq API and PandasAI: Breaking Down the Code
item.description: A step-by-step breakdown of a smart data analysis platform built with Streamlit, Groq API, and PandasAI.

item.title: AI News Generator app
item.description: Automated Content Creation with CrewAI and Cohere.
